description: Status of a server monitored by zabbix agent

panels.content:
## disks

| name | type           | (lvm)mounts | non-system data                                                                             | comments |
|------|----------------|-------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
| sda  | ssd hw raid1   | /           | docker: svn, teamcity 2k18, jfrog artifactory-oss, teampass                                                                                         |          |
| sdb  | sata hw raid10 | /mnt/svn    | svn                                                                                         |          |
| sdc  | sata hw raid1  | /mnt/data   | nfs4 shares: bp-symstore  |          |
|||                                   |smb: shares:  versions  pdb-symstore switch-symstore||


## network
bond0 : 2Gb bond of eno2, eno3 //192.168.20.245

ens2f0: 10Gb //172.16.0.3
